about_the_game:
Enter the adrenaline-fueled arena of Ghostrunner 2's Endless Moto Mode where players are thrust into the depths of the cybervoid and speed reigns supreme. Survive this treacherous motorcycle ride as long as you can and push the limits of velocity.



As you weave through the neon-lit corridors of the cybervoid, every twist and turn tests your reflexes and mastery. The perilous track is littered with obstacles and demands constant maneuvering. Your score isn't just a number; it's a testament to your ability to maintain high speeds and distance across an ever-changing track. Each ride provides a new and unique set of challenges, increasing in difficulty and suspense as you venture further into the unknown.



Beyond the rush of speed, Endless Moto Mode promises more than just a pulse-pounding experience. It's a test of skill and strategy, where the leaderboard becomes your proving ground among friends. Your score, a blend of speed and distance, charts your ascent through the ranks.



All Endless Moto Mode owners immediately receive a free motorcycle skin for your commitment to the ride. Plus, earn cosmetic rewards along the road such as exclusive sword, glove, and motorcycle skins to those who have what it takes to push further into the cybervoid.

Every moment counts in defining your legacy as you chase ever-eluding perfection in this relentless race against the unforgiving path ahead.



Buy the Ghostrunner 2 Season Pass to lock-in the Endless Moto Mode, plus all 4 cosmetic DLC packs for less.

*Ghostrunner 2 game not included. Endless Moto Mode included in Ghostrunner 2 Season Pass. Ghostrunner 2 Season Pass included in Ghostrunner 2 Brutal Edition.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and gore in realistic graphics. Violence on human and human-like characters. Mutilated and dismembered bodies. Mature coarse language. The fear-inducing atmosphere, events, and characters.
